alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Lexington; Newberry; Richland (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 15 at 4:20PM EDT until August 15 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN FAIRFIELD...SOUTHEASTERN NEWBERRY...NORTHERN LEXINGTON AND NORTHWESTERN RICHLAND COUNTIES... At 420 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Jenkinsville to Irmo to Red Bank, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include... Columbia, Lexington, West Columbia, Cayce, Irmo, Springdale, St. Andrews, Highway 6 at Lake Murray Dam, Red Bank, Oak Grove, South Congaree, Pine Ridge, Columbia International University, Harbison State Forest, Riverbanks Zoo, Columbia Metro Airport, Ballentine, Dreher Island State Park, Chapin, and Gilbert. This includes the following highways... Interstate 126 between mile markers 0 and 2. Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 47 and 67. Interstate 26 between mile markers 87 and 114. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Severe thunderstorms can produce large capsizing waves and frequent lightning. If on or near Lake Murray move away from the water and take shelter!
